vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀχαϊκός, -οῦ, ὁ
Achaicus: 1Co.16:17.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at 1Co.16.17
§ Achaicus, "belonging to Achaia"
Achaicus, (Proper name), 1Cor. 16:17*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞該古 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "屬於亞該亞"
一個哥林多基督徒的名字 (林前 16:17;16:24)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚该古 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "属于亚该亚"
一个哥林多基督徒的名字 (林前 16:17;16:24)
